---
title: "Sponge functional group type"
date: "2019-01-23"
author: "Fulton, Beth (Environment, Hobart)"
---

We have added a new functional group type - SPONGE. It acts largely like a coral (or other filter feeder) except that it is silica dependent and can be a bioeroder. To activate this functionality, in the functional_groups.csv file set the group type to SPONGE and in the isBioEroder column enter 1 instead of 0.
